duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide emergency veterinary care to a variety of cases during after-hours, weekends, and holidays.
Work with highly-trained emergency staff and utilize advanced tools and treatments to provide the best care for patients.
Collaborate with on-staff specialists and medical leaders to discuss cases, address concerns, and champion patient care.
Participate in continuous learning and professional development to stay updated with the latest advancements in veterinary medicine.
Maintain mental and physical well-being to ensure the best care for patients while balancing professional and personal life.

education_certification.credential: Doctor of Veterinary Medicine (DVM/VMD) or equivalent degree required. State Veterinary Board License in good standing.
